content: We estimate the environmental costs of landfilling and incineration of municipal solid waste, compared to recycling, to be about $100 per ton of material. The economic impact of the recycling industry is much greater.

sections.name: Economic Value of Recycling Industry
content: The gross value of the recycling and remanufacturing industry is hundreds of dollars for every ton of material recycled.
!Sources: Virginia [va_recycling] and Connecticut [ct_recycling], with Connecticut recycling volumes calculated from [recycling_rates] and [ct_waste_char].
Municipalities have a significant opportunity to create local jobs by boosting recycling. Waste management options show the following job creation potential.
